title: Bill Gates's Investment Firm Buys Controlling Stake in Four Seasons; All-cash deal by Cascade Investment will give hotel company enterprise value of $10 billion
text:
Four Seasons has about $850 million in debt, according to a person familiar with the matter.

The company's founder and chairman, Isadore Sharp, will retain his 5% stake through Triples Holdings Ltd., Four Seasons said.

Founded in 1960, Four Seasons said it now manages 121 hotels and resorts, and 46 residential properties in 47 countries. Shareholders took the company private in 2007.

The companies expect the sale to close in January 2022.

Craig Karmin contributed to this article.
